snippet: Andrew Tan's success story is something straight out of a movie. As the son of Chinese immigrants, he has climbed all the way up the billionaire leaderboard to become what reports indicate the fifth richest person in the Philippines. He's one of the most admired entrepreneurs, too, and for good reason: his diligence and his vision. Tan was said to have only dreamed of opening his own grocery ...

title: Andrew Tan (born 1952), Philippine CEO, chairman, company owner - Prabook
snippet: Andrew L. Tan is a Filipino-Chinese businessman, who engages in real estate, liquor and fast food. Originally Andrew Tan made his first fortune in brandy. He was the first property developer to pioneer the live-work-play concept. Through Travellers International Hotel Group, Inc. Andrew Tan became the biggest hotelier in the country. He is now the biggest developer of BPO companies.
